post.author: 6th Venom
post.body:
Hi everybody!
I officially anounce the "6th venom HQ mainmenu" aka "2008' mainmenu update" for D3 1.3.1.

First of all, screenshots (D3 v1.00):



Second, at the moment i only got English and French traductions of my own strings, so i'm searching for BETA testers that must traduce strings into other languages like Dutch, Italian, Spanish, Russian, etc...

Technically, it's "only" a PK4, not a mod, no dll here, just assets, so you just need to put it in your base folder to have this HQ menu.

HQ because you must admit the vanilla D3 mainmenu look like "old", even in ultra quality you got dirty fonts, washed mars textures etc.

Here you got REAL HQ fonts, i redid Mars using real maps, you can choose your start map in new game, launch a custom one, see the mp player rotating while you choose your skin, much more options, and more.

I finished the Vanilla and ROE versions (with all the changes like a slightly different main screen, SP maps choose, MP colors, etc) plus i'm actually working on a "special" Denton Mod version, and new D3 music themes for each one.

So to finish, if you think you're really able to traduce about 40 strings in one of language other than En & Fr, and you want to be a Beta tester, put your hand up please!
Don't know the release date cause i need some more languages...

Any comments are welcome,

Greg "6th Venom".

________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

Edit (18/03/2008)

I finally uploaded the Doom 3 version, here come links:
D3files: http://doom3.filefront.com/file/6th_Ven ... menu;87981
ModDB: http://www.moddb.com/games/33/doom-iii/ ... q-mainmenu

Enjoy!

________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

Edit (21/03/2008)

RoE v1.00b screenshots:


IconLibrary included in the Pk4:


here come a first link to the RoE 1.00b version:
http://www.moddb.com/games/33/doom-iii/ ... nmenu-100b

________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

Edit (22/03/2008)

link to the Doom 3 1.00b version:
http://doom3.filefront.com/file/6th_Ven ... menu;88226

2nd link to the RoE 1.00b version:
http://doom3.filefront.com/file/6th_Ven ... _ROE;88227

Cheers!

post.body: I can translate to Portuguese (Portugal). just PM me with the files and a description of what i need to translate.

post.author: Douglas Quaid

post.author: 6th Venom
post.body:
Argoon wrote:
I can translate to Portuguese (Portugal).

Douglas Quaid wrote:
I'll translate it to Irish!


Many thanks, i didn't knew this two ones were possible, sadly my game don't allow these languages...
My Sys_lang can only be English, German, French, Spanish, Italian, Russian, Polish, Korean, Japanese and Chinese.

Are yours different? I didn't heard about one or more Koreans, Japaneses or Chineses players here at D3W, so i don't plan to release those translations, the acceptable minimum would be:
English (done), French (done), Dutch(almost done). (without any disrespect to others languages)
Adding Spanish and Italian would be better, but if there are no translators, i'll not risk to do it by an internet site.

I think i'll do a very well commented english strings file , to allow each one to make its own translation if you really want it.

How many players here play with anything else than English, Dutch or French?

Edit: I'd need the 1.3.1 updated languages files in other languages than French and English, the only two ones that i got by the 1.3.1 installer.
(just in case somebody use my ingame "change language" option, to not look at some #str_****** everywhere in the menu)

post.author: 6th Venom
post.body:
Yes, but since i didn't planned it like that, i used a combination of vanilla D3 and customs strings, so will i allow a screen to show some infos in your language and some in english at the same time on the screen? will it look professionnal or "high quality" assets?!? no... i can't, it's against my religion...

On a side note, i put an Icons library (DLL) into the PK4 as a sort of bonus, i use this one with all the Doom3 specific extensions like mtr, def, script, pk4, etc... will be usefull for some of you maybe.

By The36venom


now time to acknowledge that i'm currently fighting with a strange (new) bug that randomly don't fade out the very first screen to the ROQ intro, but everything run okay after the intro.
This problem is really new, since i reworked/optimize some Gui transitions, i'm checking what's wrong at the moment... so i just sent my (commented) "english_venom_menu.lang" to Ivan_the_B (Italian job ), Douglas Quaid (Irish) and Argoon (Portuguese)...

Be sure that i really thank you guys, and i'll send you a link to the 30mb PK4 file as soon as i solve it! Be carrefull, it will autodestruct after 5 minutes and erase your Hard drives, that's a common bug.

post.author: TRSGM
post.body:
First post here, I've been haunting the various sub-zones on the forum for my ongoing project-- but more on that later.

My two cents:
- Looks kickass. My only gripe is the edge 'fringe' on some of the panels-- that looks kind of odd and I honestly think the flat/straight borders look better. The background textures, etc. look great, though.

Also: Would you mind if I packaged this in DentonMod Revision 3? I've been trying to bring a lot of Doom 3 up to modern standards and the main menu always did kind of bother me. I have a teaser up on D3Files in the PotD for today, and a list of what I've done in the comments.

And incidentally, could I recruit you to fix up the Doom 3 Alpha HUD and make a few changes? I can work magic with C++ but I lack a lot of finesse with the GUI system and am not the greatest at UI texturing. I'd like to adapt it to be more in the style of Halo 3/Metroid Prime in the sense that it looks like it's being projected on the inside of a helmet or something. Another in-the-works gameplay thing.

EDIT: Cool, I didn't see you're making a DentonMod-specific version. Awesome sauce, I'll just use that one.

Also, I was going to mention que je parle francais assez bien, mais j'ai vu que vous avez une traduction déjà.

post.author: Tetzlaff
post.body:
Nice project, looks neat!

I can do the translations into German, if you want.

post.author: 6th Venom
post.body:
If my friend run into translation problems, i'll pm you tomorrow about this Tetslaff, many thanks.

Edit: It's late in the night, so i'll pm you tomorrow too about your idea TRSGM!

post.author: TRSGM
post.body:
Cool, good to hear!

It may be a little while 'till I can get back to you tomorrow-- while we have been undergoing some rather belligerent (for lack of a better word) weather as of late over here, (I got the day off from school today) no guarantees about availability tomorrow until circa 3pm EST. PM me or whatever you see fit and I'll get back to ya whenever I can.

FYI to all, I have a thread in this subforum for DentonMod revision 3 set up in the event anyone wants some info
[/hijack]
[/shamelessplug]

post.author: simulation
post.body:
Very, very, very nice!

I love the ROQ/MD5MESH combination for the rotating player set up.

How did you re-create the font files? I've been looking for something cleaner to use myself - these look great!

Would it be ok for me to use some aspects of your work in the next update to EMZ? I'm thinking primarily of the fonts but there are some parts of the GUI design that I may be able to use (visual design is NOT one of my strong points).

Sim

post.author: simulation
post.body:
simulation wrote:
How did you re-create the font files? I've been looking for something cleaner to use myself - these look great!

Ok, I see what you did with the fonts now - replacing the 12/24 files with the 48 versions. The same effect can be achived by setting these two CVars to zero...

set gui_mediumFontLimit "0"
set gui_smallFontLimit "0"

Sim

The mod "only" accept English, French, German and Italian, cause i didn't found any translators for other languages... except a strogg...
i can help you translate the English to Simplified Chinese,how can i do?

post.author: 6th Venom
post.body:
Should be great!

Three possibilities:
If you downloaded the 1.00 or 1.00a versions:
-Open zpakv00.pk4 with winzip, extract "strings/english_venom_menu.lang" where you want, rename it "chinese_venom_menu.lang"...
-PM me an Email adress where i can send you the file.
If you downloaded the 1.00b version:
-Open zpakv00.pk4 with winzip, extract "strings/temp/chinese_venom_menu.lang" (translation attempt) where you want...

...and then open the file with any text editor (i use context) and start translating! (i advise you to open the english instance aswell for translations comments).
the send it back to me at the36venom[at]hotmail[dot]com

Thank you!

post.author: 6th Venom
post.body:
Updated 1st post links.

And for curiosity, what do my D3W's family think about it?

post.author: rich_is_bored
post.body:
IMHO, the biggest improvement was the text clarity. Not only does increasing the resolution of the fonts affect the menus, but you can see a rather dramatic impact when playing through the game aswell.

The only disappointment, and this may very well be outside your control, was that the console text didn't appear to change.

Ah, that reminds me to document those CVars simulation pointed out.

Code:
//Scene Name
   choiceDef NGBtnText4 {
      rect      5, 117, 220, 10
      choices      "Insert tr map names"
      values      "marscity1;mcunderground;marscity2;admin;alpha1;alpha2;alpha3;alpha4;enpro;commout;communications;recycling1;
recycling2;monorail;delta1;delta2a;delta2b;delta3;delta4;hell;delta5;cpu1;cpuboss;site3;caverns1;caverns2;hellhole" //"#str_3666046"
      gui      "gui_ngscene"

      choiceType   1

      forecolor   0.6, 0.8, 0.8, 1

post.author: NX-317
post.body:
I think this is it:

In guis\v_mainmenu\newgame.pd:

Code:
onTime 0 {
         if ("gui::gui_ngscene" == 0) {
            set     "NGBtnText5::text" "Waste Storage Center" ;
            set     "SceneScreen::background" "gui/v_mainmenu/vmap_rec2" ;
            //set     "NGBtnText5::text" "#str_03468" ;
            //set     "SceneScreen::background" "gui/v_mainmenu/vmap_mc1" ;
              } else if ( "gui::gui_ngscene" == 1 ) {
            set     "NGBtnText5::text" "HQ2 Test Map" ;   //"#str_03504"
            set     "SceneScreen::background" "gui/v_mainmenu/vmap_mcu" ;
              } else if ( "gui::gui_ngscene" == 2 ) {
            set     "NGBtnText5::text" "COMING SOON" ;            
            //set     "NGBtnText5::text" "#str_03468" ;
            set     "SceneScreen::background" "" ;
            //set     "SceneScreen::background" "gui/v_mainmenu/vmap_mc2" ;
              } else if ( "gui::gui_ngscene" == 3 ) {            
            set     "NGBtnText5::text" "COMING SOON" ;            
            //set     "NGBtnText5::text" "#str_02647" ;
            set     "SceneScreen::background" "" ;
            //set     "SceneScreen::background" "gui/v_mainmenu/vmap_adm" ;
              }

Changes the image when you select a level.


In guis\v_mainmenu\transitions.pd:

Code:
transition "SceneScreen::matcolor" "0 .8 1 0" "1 1 1 1" "1000" ;

Fades in the map image when you click the new game button.


Code:
set "NewGameContainer::visible" "0" ;
transition "SceneScreen::matcolor" "0.65 1 1 1" "0.65 1 1 0" "50" ;

Removes the map image when you close the new game window.


The images themselves are materials which can be found in materials\Venom_menu.mtr

This code is likely different from yours, because I don't have the original version of this menu and look in the files from HardQuore2.

post.author: Douglas Quaid
post.body:
I'm looking for the actual windowDef information because I want to be able to move the image transition stuff to another part of the screen. I would be looking for something like this...
Code:
windowDef LVLIMAGECIRCLE {
rect 200, 400, 320, 100
}

The above code may sound a little silly but I want to be able to move the Image transition circle to somewhere else on the screen and need to find the code for this.

Thanks nonetheless NX

post.author: NX-317
post.body:
Well, since it is called SceneScreen in the code, this should be the right WindowDef:

In guis\v_mainmenu\newgame.pd:
Code:
windowDef SceneScreen {
   rect      180, 80, 280, 230
   background   "gui/v_mainmenu/vmap_mc1"
   matcolor   0.65 ,1 ,1 ,0
//   backcolor   0.5 ,0 ,0 ,.5
        visible         1
   noevents   1
}

post.body:
open 6t venoms pk4 with winrar/7zip and extract guis/v_mainmenu/primary.pd

open it with notepad++ and put this after everything else

Code:
//=================================================================================
// START SIKKMOD MENU
//=================================================================================
   windowDef SikkmodBtnText {
      rect      202, 448, 150, 22
      text      "SIKKMOD OPTIONS"
      textscale   0.25
      textalign   1
      forecolor   1.0, 1.0, 1.0, 0.4
      visible      1
      notime      1

         set         "ToolTip1::text" "Sikkmod Options Menu";
         set         "ToolTip2::text" "Sikkmod Options Menu";
         transition   "forecolor" "1.0 1.0 1.0 0.4" "1.0 1.0 1.0 1.0" "100";
         resetTime   "ToolTip1" "0";
      }

         resetTime   "ToolTip2" "0";
      }

      onAction {

         set         "cmd" "play guisounds_menuclickup";
         set         "noevents" "1";

put it back into 6th venoms pk4 and save.

open pak_modfiles.pk4 and delete mainmenu.gui save and close.

sikkmod settings are now a part of 6th venoms menu

post.author: lukeman3000
post.body: Reckless, thank you!

post.author: lukeman3000
post.body:
reckless wrote:
open 6t venoms pk4 with winrar/7zip and extract guis/v_mainmenu/primary.pd

open it with notepad++ and put this after everything else

Code:
//=================================================================================
// START SIKKMOD MENU
//=================================================================================
   windowDef SikkmodBtnText {
      rect      202, 448, 150, 22
      text      "SIKKMOD OPTIONS"
      textscale   0.25
      textalign   1
      forecolor   1.0, 1.0, 1.0, 0.4
      visible      1
      notime      1

      onMouseEnter {
         set         "ToolTip1::text" "Sikkmod Options Menu";
         set         "ToolTip2::text" "Sikkmod Options Menu";
         transition   "forecolor" "1.0 1.0 1.0 0.4" "1.0 1.0 1.0 1.0" "100";
         resetTime   "ToolTip1" "0";
      }

      onMouseExit {
         transition   "forecolor" "0.6 0.8 0.8 1.0" "1.0 1.0 1.0 0.4" "200";
         resetTime   "ToolTip2" "0";
      }

      onAction {
         set         "sikkmod_options::visible" "1";
         set         "cmd" "play guisounds_menuclickup";
         set         "noevents" "1";
         transition   "forecolor" "0.6 0.8 0.8 1.0" "1.0 1.0 1.0 0.4" "200";
         resetTime   "ToolTip2" "0";
         resetTime   "0";
      }
      
      onTime 5000 {
         set         "noevents" "0";
      }
   }

post.author: 6th Venom
post.body:
Hi everybody!
I officially anounce the "6th venom HQ mainmenu" aka "2008' mainmenu update" for D3 1.3.1.

First of all, screenshots (D3 v1.00):



Second, at the moment i only got English and French traductions of my own strings, so i'm searching for BETA testers that must traduce strings into other languages like Dutch, Italian, Spanish, Russian, etc...

Technically, it's "only" a PK4, not a mod, no dll here, just assets, so you just need to put it in your base folder to have this HQ menu.

HQ because you must admit the vanilla D3 mainmenu look like "old", even in ultra quality you got dirty fonts, washed mars textures etc.

Here you got REAL HQ fonts, i redid Mars using real maps, you can choose your start map in new game, launch a custom one, see the mp player rotating while you choose your skin, much more options, and more.

I finished the Vanilla and ROE versions (with all the changes like a slightly different main screen, SP maps choose, MP colors, etc) plus i'm actually working on a "special" Denton Mod version, and new D3 music themes for each one.

So to finish, if you think you're really able to traduce about 40 strings in one of language other than En & Fr, and you want to be a Beta tester, put your hand up please!
Don't know the release date cause i need some more languages...

Any comments are welcome,

Greg "6th Venom".

________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

Edit (18/03/2008)

I finally uploaded the Doom 3 version, here come links:
D3files: http://doom3.filefront.com/file/6th_Ven ... menu;87981
ModDB: http://www.moddb.com/games/33/doom-iii/ ... q-mainmenu

Enjoy!

________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

Edit (21/03/2008)

RoE v1.00b screenshots:


IconLibrary included in the Pk4:


here come a first link to the RoE 1.00b version:
http://www.moddb.com/games/33/doom-iii/ ... nmenu-100b

________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

Edit (22/03/2008)

link to the Doom 3 1.00b version:
http://doom3.filefront.com/file/6th_Ven ... menu;88226

2nd link to the RoE 1.00b version:
http://doom3.filefront.com/file/6th_Ven ... _ROE;88227

Cheers!

post.author: Argoon
post.body: I can translate to Portuguese (Portugal). just PM me with the files and a description of what i need to translate.

post.author: Douglas Quaid
post.body: I'll translate it to Irish!

post.author: 6th Venom
post.body:
Argoon wrote:
I can translate to Portuguese (Portugal).

Douglas Quaid wrote:
I'll translate it to Irish!


Many thanks, i didn't knew this two ones were possible, sadly my game don't allow these languages...
My Sys_lang can only be English, German, French, Spanish, Italian, Russian, Polish, Korean, Japanese and Chinese.

Are yours different? I didn't heard about one or more Koreans, Japaneses or Chineses players here at D3W, so i don't plan to release those translations, the acceptable minimum would be:
English (done), French (done), Dutch(almost done). (without any disrespect to others languages)
Adding Spanish and Italian would be better, but if there are no translators, i'll not risk to do it by an internet site.

I think i'll do a very well commented english strings file , to allow each one to make its own translation if you really want it.

How many players here play with anything else than English, Dutch or French?

Edit: I'd need the 1.3.1 updated languages files in other languages than French and English, the only two ones that i got by the 1.3.1 installer.
(just in case somebody use my ingame "change language" option, to not look at some #str_****** everywhere in the menu)

post.author: 6th Venom
post.body:
Yes, but since i didn't planned it like that, i used a combination of vanilla D3 and customs strings, so will i allow a screen to show some infos in your language and some in english at the same time on the screen? will it look professionnal or "high quality" assets?!? no... i can't, it's against my religion...

On a side note, i put an Icons library (DLL) into the PK4 as a sort of bonus, i use this one with all the Doom3 specific extensions like mtr, def, script, pk4, etc... will be usefull for some of you maybe.

By The36venom


now time to acknowledge that i'm currently fighting with a strange (new) bug that randomly don't fade out the very first screen to the ROQ intro, but everything run okay after the intro.
This problem is really new, since i reworked/optimize some Gui transitions, i'm checking what's wrong at the moment... so i just sent my (commented) "english_venom_menu.lang" to Ivan_the_B (Italian job ), Douglas Quaid (Irish) and Argoon (Portuguese)...

Be sure that i really thank you guys, and i'll send you a link to the 30mb PK4 file as soon as i solve it! Be carrefull, it will autodestruct after 5 minutes and erase your Hard drives, that's a common bug.

post.author: TRSGM
post.body:
First post here, I've been haunting the various sub-zones on the forum for my ongoing project-- but more on that later.

My two cents:
- Looks kickass. My only gripe is the edge 'fringe' on some of the panels-- that looks kind of odd and I honestly think the flat/straight borders look better. The background textures, etc. look great, though.

Also: Would you mind if I packaged this in DentonMod Revision 3? I've been trying to bring a lot of Doom 3 up to modern standards and the main menu always did kind of bother me. I have a teaser up on D3Files in the PotD for today, and a list of what I've done in the comments.

And incidentally, could I recruit you to fix up the Doom 3 Alpha HUD and make a few changes? I can work magic with C++ but I lack a lot of finesse with the GUI system and am not the greatest at UI texturing. I'd like to adapt it to be more in the style of Halo 3/Metroid Prime in the sense that it looks like it's being projected on the inside of a helmet or something. Another in-the-works gameplay thing.

EDIT: Cool, I didn't see you're making a DentonMod-specific version. Awesome sauce, I'll just use that one.

Also, I was going to mention que je parle francais assez bien, mais j'ai vu que vous avez une traduction déjà.

post.author: Tetzlaff
post.body:
Nice project, looks neat!

I can do the translations into German, if you want.

post.author: 6th Venom
post.body:
If my friend run into translation problems, i'll pm you tomorrow about this Tetslaff, many thanks.

Edit: It's late in the night, so i'll pm you tomorrow too about your idea TRSGM!

post.author: TRSGM
post.body:
Cool, good to hear!

It may be a little while 'till I can get back to you tomorrow-- while we have been undergoing some rather belligerent (for lack of a better word) weather as of late over here, (I got the day off from school today) no guarantees about availability tomorrow until circa 3pm EST. PM me or whatever you see fit and I'll get back to ya whenever I can.

FYI to all, I have a thread in this subforum for DentonMod revision 3 set up in the event anyone wants some info

post.body:
simulation wrote:
How did you re-create the font files? I've been looking for something cleaner to use myself - these look great!

Ok, I see what you did with the fonts now - replacing the 12/24 files with the 48 versions. The same effect can be achived by setting these two CVars to zero...

set gui_mediumFontLimit "0"
set gui_smallFontLimit "0"

Sim

post.author: 6th Venom
post.body:
Should be great!

Three possibilities:
If you downloaded the 1.00 or 1.00a versions:
-Open zpakv00.pk4 with winzip, extract "strings/english_venom_menu.lang" where you want, rename it "chinese_venom_menu.lang"...
-PM me an Email adress where i can send you the file.
If you downloaded the 1.00b version:
-Open zpakv00.pk4 with winzip, extract "strings/temp/chinese_venom_menu.lang" (translation attempt) where you want...

...and then open the file with any text editor (i use context) and start translating! (i advise you to open the english instance aswell for translations comments).
the send it back to me at the36venom[at]hotmail[dot]com

Thank you!

post.author: NX-317
post.body:
I think this is it:

In guis\v_mainmenu\newgame.pd:

Code:
onTime 0 {
         if ("gui::gui_ngscene" == 0) {
            set     "NGBtnText5::text" "Waste Storage Center" ;
            set     "SceneScreen::background" "gui/v_mainmenu/vmap_rec2" ;
            //set     "NGBtnText5::text" "#str_03468" ;
            //set     "SceneScreen::background" "gui/v_mainmenu/vmap_mc1" ;
              } else if ( "gui::gui_ngscene" == 1 ) {
            set     "NGBtnText5::text" "HQ2 Test Map" ;   //"#str_03504"
            set     "SceneScreen::background" "gui/v_mainmenu/vmap_mcu" ;
              } else if ( "gui::gui_ngscene" == 2 ) {
            set     "NGBtnText5::text" "COMING SOON" ;            
            //set     "NGBtnText5::text" "#str_03468" ;
            set     "SceneScreen::background" "" ;
            //set     "SceneScreen::background" "gui/v_mainmenu/vmap_mc2" ;
              } else if ( "gui::gui_ngscene" == 3 ) {            
            set     "NGBtnText5::text" "COMING SOON" ;            
            //set     "NGBtnText5::text" "#str_02647" ;
            set     "SceneScreen::background" "" ;
            //set     "SceneScreen::background" "gui/v_mainmenu/vmap_adm" ;
              }

Changes the image when you select a level.


In guis\v_mainmenu\transitions.pd:

Code:
transition "SceneScreen::matcolor" "0 .8 1 0" "1 1 1 1" "1000" ;

Fades in the map image when you click the new game button.


Code:
set "NewGameContainer::visible" "0" ;
transition "SceneScreen::matcolor" "0.65 1 1 1" "0.65 1 1 0" "50" ;

Removes the map image when you close the new game window.


The images themselves are materials which can be found in materials\Venom_menu.mtr

This code is likely different from yours, because I don't have the original version of this menu and look in the files from HardQuore2.

post.author: Douglas Quaid
post.body:
I'm looking for the actual windowDef information because I want to be able to move the image transition stuff to another part of the screen. I would be looking for something like this...
Code:
windowDef LVLIMAGECIRCLE {
rect 200, 400, 320, 100
}

The above code may sound a little silly but I want to be able to move the Image transition circle to somewhere else on the screen and need to find the code for this.

Thanks nonetheless NX

post.author: NX-317
post.body:
Well, since it is called SceneScreen in the code, this should be the right WindowDef:

In guis\v_mainmenu\newgame.pd:
Code:
windowDef SceneScreen {
   rect      180, 80, 280, 230
   background   "gui/v_mainmenu/vmap_mc1"
   matcolor   0.65 ,1 ,1 ,0
//   backcolor   0.5 ,0 ,0 ,.5
        visible         1
   noevents   1
}

post.body:
open 6t venoms pk4 with winrar/7zip and extract guis/v_mainmenu/primary.pd

open it with notepad++ and put this after everything else

Code:
//=================================================================================
// START SIKKMOD MENU
//=================================================================================
   windowDef SikkmodBtnText {
      rect      202, 448, 150, 22
      text      "SIKKMOD OPTIONS"
      textscale   0.25
      textalign   1
      forecolor   1.0, 1.0, 1.0, 0.4
      visible      1
      notime      1

         set         "ToolTip1::text" "Sikkmod Options Menu";
         set         "ToolTip2::text" "Sikkmod Options Menu";
         transition   "forecolor" "1.0 1.0 1.0 0.4" "1.0 1.0 1.0 1.0" "100";
         resetTime   "ToolTip1" "0";

         resetTime   "ToolTip2" "0";

put it back into 6th venoms pk4 and save.

open pak_modfiles.pk4 and delete mainmenu.gui save and close.

sikkmod settings are now a part of 6th venoms menu

post.author: lukeman3000
post.body: Reckless, thank you!

post.author: lukeman3000
post.body:
reckless wrote:
open 6t venoms pk4 with winrar/7zip and extract guis/v_mainmenu/primary.pd

open it with notepad++ and put this after everything else

Code:
//=================================================================================
// START SIKKMOD MENU
//=================================================================================
   windowDef SikkmodBtnText {
      rect      202, 448, 150, 22
      text      "SIKKMOD OPTIONS"
      textscale   0.25
      textalign   1
      forecolor   1.0, 1.0, 1.0, 0.4
      visible      1
      notime      1

      onMouseEnter {
         set         "ToolTip1::text" "Sikkmod Options Menu";
         set         "ToolTip2::text" "Sikkmod Options Menu";
         transition   "forecolor" "1.0 1.0 1.0 0.4" "1.0 1.0 1.0 1.0" "100";
         resetTime   "ToolTip1" "0";
      }

      onMouseExit {
         transition   "forecolor" "0.6 0.8 0.8 1.0" "1.0 1.0 1.0 0.4" "200";
         resetTime   "ToolTip2" "0";
      }

      onAction {
         set         "sikkmod_options::visible" "1";
         set         "cmd" "play guisounds_menuclickup";
         set         "noevents" "1";
         transition   "forecolor" "0.6 0.8 0.8 1.0" "1.0 1.0 1.0 0.4" "200";
         resetTime   "ToolTip2" "0";
         resetTime   "0";
      }
      
      onTime 5000 {
         set         "noevents" "0";
      }
   }
   
   windowDef sikkmod_options {
      rect      0, 0, 640, 480
      text      "Sikkmod Options"
      textscale   0.25
      textalign   1
      backcolor   0.1796875, 0.25, 0.296875, 0.8
      visible      0
      notime      1
      modal      1

//=====================================================
// All Sikkmod Options Titles here

put it back into 6th venoms pk4 and save.

open pak_modfiles.pk4 and delete mainmenu.gui save and close.

sikkmod settings are now a part of 6th venoms menu


Does this also work for 6th Venom ROE?

post.author: reckless
post.body:
It might but the sikkpin code for ROE is a bit older so its probably better to check it first.

My pack has it with the code from his ROE mod.

post.author: lukeman3000
post.body:
So, is that massive mount of code just copied and pasted from sikkmod itself and put into Venom's mod?

Could I just open up sikkmod ROE and take the menu code out of there and put it into Venom?

post.author: reckless
post.body:
pretty much aye just remember to remove sikkmods mainmenu.gui file.

theres also a few other things to do that i forgot to post ill see if i can dig up the changes nessesary.

post.author: reckless
post.body: Btw confirmed the skill setting is not working no matter what you select g_skill defaults to 0. Can check it by entering g_skill in the console it will allways return 0 with venoms hd menu. For now untill someone can look into fixing this set g_skill via the console 3 is nightmare.
